column4: Hi guys, can anyone have a look at my apache virtual host config for me ... ? All my domains point to my default domain. I don't know what's wrong. I've checked the docs and everything. If some apache wizard out there could  take a peek it'd be much appreciated ... :-)
paste it to my bot at is what i meant http://arrick.no-ip.org:8888
I have no idea how to do that dude ... :-(
I click on the pastebot link - nothing happens ...
I think all you need is to remove the :80 cause they go default to 80 no matter what
tried that as well, it just tells me it can't establish connection .... :-(
ok tried it ... still not working though ... :-(
do you have the apache2.conf pasted anywhere?

it's a remote server and I just have a terminal installed. So I can't really just cut and paste it. I can copy it locally though if you think it'd help. I've also posted a copy of my httpd -S output ... http://pastebin.com/704595
let me guess, your in apahce not apahce2 right
no apache2 ... here's the config file ... http://pastebin.com/704599
your httpd.conf isw a LITTLE BEYOND me, have you tried this in #apache channel?
